alert.note: Alert for Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:12PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Columbus, southeastern Dillon, northwestern Horry and northeastern Marion Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bayboro, or 12 miles southeast of Mullins, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake View, Bayboro, Green Sea and Nichols. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
